item.title: Top for MySQL with mytop
item.description: I see Samuel Huckins just had a post about apachetop http://dancingpenguinsoflight.com/2008/12/top-for-apache-activity/ which I have been meaning to mention for a while, but being that there is a fresh post about it I will mention Mytop instead. Mytop is top for mysql. It can be used for monitoring the threads and overall performance of a MySQL. Its an easy install in debain with a quick aptitude install mytop. item.title: Infrastructure monitoring with Zabbix
item.description: Zabbix is an opensource network monitoring application somewhat akin to Nagios and Cacti. I have been using Zabbix for about 8 months, and I am pleased with its results.
